---
title: "Histograms"
output: html_document
---

```{r load_in_data}
rm(list = ls())
library(datasets)
data(airquality)
nrow(airquality)
```

```{r basic_plot}
g1 <- ggplot(airquality, aes(x = Ozone)) +
        geom_histogram()
g1
```

```{r frequency_plot}
g2 <- ggplot(airquality, aes(x = Ozone)) +
        geom_histogram(aes(y = ..count..))
g2
```

```{r adjust_binwidth}
g3 <- ggplot(airquality, aes(x = Ozone)) +
        geom_histogram(aes(y = ..count..), binwidth = 5)
g3
```

```{r changing_axis_labels_1}
g4 <- g3 + scale_x_continuous(name = "Mean ozone in parts per billion") +
        scale_y_continuous(name = "Count")
g4
```

```{r changing_axis_labels_2}
g5 <- g3 + scale_x_continuous(name = "Mean ozone in\nparts per billion") +
        scale_y_continuous(name = "Count")
g5
```

```{r changing_ticks}
g6 <- g3 + scale_x_continuous(name = "Mean ozone in\nparts per billion",
                              breaks = seq(0, 175, 25),
                              limits=c(0, 175)) +
        scale_y_continuous(name = "Count")
g6
```
